akas: Кто обманет Пенна и Теллера? Russia
akas from release info: Кто обманет Пенна и Теллера? Russia

0.title: April Fool Us Day
0.plot: In this April Fools' Day clip show special, Penn and Teller educate the audience about the nature of their show, analyze how some of the "foolers" fooled them, catch one in a unique lie, and bring back another to "explain" his trick.

1.title: Penn the Magic Dragon
1.plot: Matt Marcy does a presentation on his card trick. Vintage act The Sentimentalists guess an image. Andrew Evans has his friend Naomi levitate. Don Chambers pulls beer out of thin air. Penn and Piff the Magic Dragon sing a guessing song.

2.title: The Rematch
2.plot: Rematch with "foolers": Gilbert Gottfried helps Vinny Grosso with a stuffed trick, Morgan and West do a trick that adds up, Paul Gertner does a card guessing trick, Eric Jones plays with flaming coins, and Penn and Teller misdirect us.

3.title: Penn & Teller Get Loopy
3.plot: Music magician Ryan Chandler, coin magician Ryan Hayashi, German veteran levitation magician Dirk Losander, and scientist magician Ed Ripley hope to fool the veteran duo. Also, Penn and Teller use a magic box to full us.

4.title: Here Comes the Magic
4.plot: Magicians Danny Cole, returning champion Kostya Kimlat, Swedish magician-musician Hakan Berg, and John Michael Hinton try to fool the veteran duo with their tricks. Also, Penn and Teller tell the sad magic story of Prisoner 42799.

5.title: Psych!!
5.plot: Psychology student and amateur mentalist Emily Victoria, sentimental German magician Patrick Folkerts, card illusionist Migz, and edgy escape artist Seth Grabel try to fool Penn and Teller. Also, Kim Raver pulls an egg from their sack.

6.title: Penn & Teller Against the World
6.plot: Taijyi Fujryama from Japan, Pit Hartling from Germany, Helen Coghlan from Australia, and Menny Lindenfeld from Israel try to fool the veteran duo with their tricks. Also, Penn and Teller play a guessing game with mint containers.

7.title: Imagine (Magic) Dragons
7.plot: Funnyman Erik Tait plays invisible cards, Rebecca Herrera guesses which shape Teller drew, Japanese comedian TanBA eats razors and balloons, Alyson fires crossbows at Ian Stewart, and P&T ask rock star Dan Reynolds to follow their lead.

8.title: Here Lie Penn & Teller
8.plot: Damien James' P&T puppets guess a card, Kelvin Chow's cards are magic, Joshua Lozoff and Alyson guess an animal, historian Murray Sawchuck performs Mr. Electric's classic, and Penn and Teller create a card trick for the ages - literally.

9.title: Teller's Gambling Problem
9.plot: It's Will Bradshaw vs. animal traps, mentalist Eric Dittelman masters double entendre, Christian Engblom makes cards vanish, Compagnie des Dragonfly mix up their assistants and comedian Tom Green helps Penn with Teller's gambling problem.

10.title: Penn & Teller Keep You in Suspense
10.plot: Tech magician Simon Pierro 3D-prints a celebrity, shock magician Nicholas Wallace feeds blindfolded Alyson deadly cookies, Darcy Oake teleports a card into a bottle, Alex Geiser pushes coins through glass and P&T help a girl levitate.

11.title: The Fool Us Zone
11.plot: Tyler Twombly plays with stickers, Dr. Michael Rubinstein has coins from The Twilight Zone (1959), shock magician Anastasia Synn uses her body modifications, co-creator of Siri, Adam Cheyer, turns Siri into cards, and Penn hides in a barrel.

12.title: Never Trust a Magician
12.plot: French card magician Alexandra Duvivier, ventriloquist Christine Barger, her mentalist doll and Scott 'Carrot Top' Thompson, high tech magician Jamie Allan, and phone mentalist Christopher Grace try to fool the veteran duo. Also, Penn counts cards.

13.title: Let's Hear it for the Kids
13.plot: Magician Kiko Pastur does a card trick for Alyson, Jason Palter can measure any distance instinctively, Michael Gee does a card trick with his toy car, Bryan Saint creates a magical infomercial, and the boys teach kids to guess colors.

0.title: Pilot: How to Saw a Woman in Half
0.plot: Magicians Ali Cook, Richard Bellars, Michael Vincent, John Archer, James More, and Benjamin Earl try to fool the veteran duo. Those who succeed win a trip to Las Vegas where they open for Penn & Teller's Vegas magic show. Hosted by Jonathan Ross.

1.title: Teller Sucks... Helium
1.plot: Magicians High Jinx, Jon Allen, and Graham Jolley try to fool the veteran duo with their tricks. Prior foolers John Archer and Benjamin Earl visit Vegas.

2.title: Stab a Card, Any Card...
2.plot: A former canoe instructor's trick puts Jonathan on edge, a man uses a beach ball in his prediction act and two buddies try for a great escape.

3.title: Solid Goldfish
3.plot: Performances by Piff the Magic Dragon, Damien O'Brien, David Masters and Soma.

4.title: Teller Is a Blockhead
4.plot: Performances by: Daniel Kramer, Gazzo, Alan Rorrison and Romany.

5.title: Penn Gets Nailed
5.plot: Performances by Cubic Act, Nick Einhorn, Michael Vincent and Morgan & West.

6.title: The Magic of Polyester
6.plot: Performances by Brynolf and Ljung, Colin McLeod, Keelan Leyser and Charlotte Marie and Etienne Pradier.

7.title: A Bellyful of Needles
7.plot: Magician Lee Hathaway performs a card trick using a gimmick he calls a "Stomack entering device". Magician Jack Taperell, a 14 year-old kid, performs a mind reading card trick on Penn and Teller. Laura London, a red-headed magician, does a trick using a pound of Ross' money. Magician Martin Daniels does a classic levitation and switching routine set to classic song "Phanton of the Opera Is here", for Penn, Teller, the audience, and most importantly his father. Penn and Teller end the show with a trick involving Penn and a card trick while Teller is submerged in a case...

8.title: Water Tanks for the Memories
8.plot: Performances by: Lee Hathaway, Jack Taperell and Laura London

1.title: Phone-y Business
1.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Jon Armstrong with a card trick involving a mini plunger, Xavier Mortimer battling his ghostly reflection, Greg Dow (The Shocker) with his predictions, Steven Brundage doing tricks with Rubik's Cubes, and finally Penn & Teller do a trick involving an audience member's cellphone.

2.title: The Invisi-Ball Thread
2.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Leone Etienne and Romy Low (AKA: Leon & Romy) with a card trick, Mike Hammer with an inflated prediction trick, Shin Lim doing various card tricks to instrumental music, Peter Boie and his spirited trick, and Teller does tricks with a ball and string.

3.title: Shoot to Kill
3.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Brian Brushwood with a trick involving dollar bills, Simon Pierro with his "digital magic" using a large tablet computer, Handsome Jack (John Lovick) handsomely twisting an old town paper trick, Kyle Knight & Mistie doing a quick-escape trick, and finally Penn & Teller with magic signed bullets.

4.title: Knife of the Party
4.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Austin Janik doing a card trick (with Ross), Allison Campbell (Amazing Allison) doing a mentalist trick (with Penn & Teller); Mac King with a twist on the cups and balls trick and an additional disappearing animal trick, purposefully setting out to fool his old friends Penn & Teller; Norman Ng with a mentalist trick involving a drawing (with Ross), and Penn & Teller doing an old sneaky knife throwing trick with an attractive audience member.

5.title: Mission Impossi-Ball
5.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Bill Cook with an invisible card trick, "stunt magician" Wes Barker with a mentalist trick using a phone book and a sword, Matthew Holtzclaw doing a couple of tricks with needle thread, David Regal does a card trick where no card is selected, and finally Penn & Teller show us how the cups and balls trick is done.

6.title: Now THAT's Bunny!
6.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Jay Sankey doing various card tricks, Greg Wilson with a big performance close to not only his heart alone, Trigg Watson doing card and app tricks, Jen Kramer doing an intelligent card trick (using Ross), and Penn & Teller do the old classic of pulling a rabbit out of a hat.

7.title: Penn's Favorite Card Trick
7.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Kostya Kimlat with a card trick Penn & Teller have never seen before, Frederick Falk doing a trick with a wind-up watch (with actor Simon Pegg ), Chris Funk presenting card tricks and utilizing his violin, Nate Dendy doing a trick with confetti (breifly using Ross), and finally Teller does a card trick for Penn.

8.title: Teller Plays with a Full Deck
8.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Blake Vogt doing an alternate version of the linking rings, Joshua Jay with a card trick done blind-folded, Levent Cimkentli not knot doing tricks with handkerchiefs (briefly using Ross), Ben Seidman doing comedy and magic, and finally Teller does card tricks while Penn narrates and plays guitar.

9.title: Star Spangled Magic
9.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Riley Siegler (the youngest contestant yet) with slight-of-hand cards with Penn & Teller, Chen Be Seen ("Jade") with the help of Ross gets tied up while Ross holds his pole formally, Randy Shine ("Ran'D Shine") brings Penn & Teller up and tries to fool them with a card guessing trick, David Roth does close up coin tricks for Penn & Teller, and Penn & Teller do a very patriotic trick.

10.title: Where There's Smoke There's Magic
10.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Joel Meyers & Bedros Akkelian ("Spidey") doing a mentalist trick, Rick Lax with a complicated card trick (utilizing Penn & Teller), Marcus Eddie with a trick using a metal chain (briefly using Penn & Teller), comedy magician Bruce Gold with his psychic toaster, and finally Teller once again does his trick involving smoking (as Penn plays double bass).

11.title: Teller Deflowers a Shadow
11.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Scott Alexander & Malcolm Puckering ("Puck") do a trick passing threw bars, Eric Jones does coin tricks (with two audience members next two him), Mark Calabrese does a card trick with Ross, Paul Vigil (Vee-hill) does a mentalist trick (briefly utilizing Penn), and finally Teller does a trick involving a flower and its shadow that has never been performed on television before. No turtles were harmed in the filming of this episode.

12.title: Penn & Teller Ring Someone's Neck
12.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Victor & Diamond Cephas do tricks that are for the birds, Francis Menotti with his verbal brow beating does a trick with Scrabble, Nash Fung does a trick with Penn's driver's license, Chad Juros does rope tricks which may or may knot full the duo, and finally Penn & Teller play tricks on an audience member's mind using metal rings.

13.title: An Egg-Cellent Trick
13.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Derek Hughes does card tricks with two audience members, Reuben Moreland does tricks involving cards and dice, Suzanne [last name not found] does a trick with band aides (using Ross), Jared Kopf uses three audience members to do a "random" trick, and finally Penn & Teller do an eggciting trick using an egg.

1.title: Won't Get Fooled Again...?
1.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Shawn Farquhar returns to try and fool them again, doing a memory trick (utilizing Hannigan); Michael Kent does a trick with bottles and glass cups; Nathan Burton does a couple of disappearing people tricks; Nathan Coe Marsh does a trick with a small glass jar (utilizing Hannigan); and finally Penn and Teller do an audience-participation trick with cards.

2.title: Jesse Eisenberg Gets Carded
2.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this time: Loudermilk does a trick that's hard to swallow (with Hannigan); Dan Harlan does a card trick; Ryan Joyce does an illusion with women; Eschen does a trick; and finally Penn, Teller and Eisenberg do a trick for Hannigan.

3.title: Penn & Teller Have a Blast
3.plot: Magacians looking to foll them this episode: Robert Ramirez does a prediction game (utilizing Teller), Dominik Krzanowski does a hands-on escape trick, Joel Ward does a disappearing item trick (utilizing Hannigan), Mahdi Gilbert does hands-off card tricks (with the hosts), and finally Penn & Teller show us how a trick works.

4.title: Penn Plays with Fire
4.plot: Magicians David and Leeman, Jibrizy, Rick Maisel, and Felix Bodden try to fool the veteran duo with their tricks.

5.title: You Dirty Rathead!
5.plot: Magacians looking to foll them this episode: Alex Ramon does a trick with an iPad, Greg Frewin plays with three women and knives, Vinny Grosso (using Carrot Top) gives us the full 52 monty, Arthur Trace does a timely eggcellent trick (utilizing Hannigan), and finally Penn teaches Alyson a card trick.

6.title: Penn & Teller Snake Their Chances
6.plot: Magacians looking to fool them this episode: Elliot Zimet boxes up a girl, Paul Gertner does wordy card tricks (inviting Hannigan to watch), Matthew Disero guesses the colors of audience members underwear, Rokas Bernatonis (utilizing Hannigan) does a card guessing trick, and finally Penn and Teller do a snakelicious trick.

7.title: Juggle, Juggle, Penn's in Trouble
7.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Vitaly Beckman does a card guessing trick (utilizing Hannigan), Simon Coronel does a trick using poker chips, Mac King returns hungry as ever with a fish trick (disgusting Hannigan), Kevin Viner does a mentalist trick, and finally Penn juggles dangerously.

8.title: Here's Moxie!
8.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Matthew Laslo does a card trick that blows, Rob Zabrecky performs a mentalist trick with four audience members, David Garrard shows us how a trick is done, Wayne Hoffman does a mentalist trick (breifly utilizing Penn & Teller), and finally Teller just can't shut up with his salute to recycling.

9.title: The Great Escape
9.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Xavier Mortimer returns to skip rope, Fielding West does tricks that are for the birds, Caleb Wiles uses Hannigan to fool them, Ken Hall entertains us with magical anagrams, and finally Penn and Teller release their inner sadomasochists.

10.title: To Tea, or Not to Tea?
10.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Timon Krause messes his Hannigan's mind, Kyle Marlett does a card trick (utlizing Penn and Alyson), Jeff and Tessa Evason to a mentalist trick, Anthony S. Riniti (AKA: Chef Anton) plays pool with Alyson, and finally Penn & Teller do tricks with a doorway metal detector.

11.title: Penn and Teller Get Trapped
11.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Christopher Tracy & Jim Leach do card tricks for Penn and Teller, Neil Croswell does a dress swap trick, Ben Young does a numbers trick using Penn's iPhone and Hannigan as an assistant, Henok Negash does a mentalist trick, and finally Penn does a grizzly trick.

12.title: Penn and Teller Rip for Your Pleasure
12.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Joseph Reohm cups a trick, Brent Braun does a card-finding trick, Chris Rose gives Teller and Alyson cookies and milk, Charles Bach plays with balloons, and finally Penn reads the newspaper headlines with Teller.

13.title: Can Penn & Teller Fool Penn & Teller?
13.plot: Magicians looking to fool them on the season finale: Anthony Asimov plays with cards and nuts, Angela Funovits shows us what's in the box, Ivan Amodei clumps audience members, Vince Charming puzzles us, and finally Penn & Teller do a skit where they try to fool themselves.

1.title: Penn & Teller Teach You a Trick
1.plot: Season premier includes an epic performance by sightless card mechanic Richard Turner, Young + Strange take second try, Mike Super does a small trick in a big way, Kayla Drescher brings the woman's touch to magic and the boys teach a trick.

2.title: Penn, Teller and a Mind Reading Chicken
2.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Jonathan Burns does a cheesy trick, Jo De Rijck does a trick with his chicken, David Caserta saws himself in half, Jimmy Ichihana does a card trick that follows suit, and finally Penn and Teller do a trick with Hannigan on a couch in pajamas.

3.title: Teller Flips a Bird
3.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this episode: Misty Lee takes a stab at Louie Anderson, Shin Lim returns with magical cards, Andi Gladwin swims for a win, Murray Hatfield (with assistant Teresa) tricks outside the box, and finally Teller performs as an unprofessional magician (while Penn plays a drum kit).

4.title: 50/50 Chance
4.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this time: escape artist Matt Johnson does a dangerous water torture chamber escape trick, wacky comedian-magician Siegfried Tieber does an impossible card trick with the assistance of Penn and Teller, Jason Fields does a trick with teleporting coins in front of the boys, professional fire eater Jessica Jane Peterson plays with fire and does a mentalist trick with a newspaper article, and finally, with the assistant of trusty Teller in the high tech control room, Penn does a particularly extravagant mentalist card trick in the middle of ...

5.title: Does This Trick Ring a Bell?
5.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this time: steampunk enthusiast Dino Staats vaporizes Penn's one dollar bill with the help of "Science!", mysterious Aiden Sinclair, who has history with Penn, does a mentalist trick with Alyson and an evil doll, Swedish magician Axel Adler plays with a floating magic rings and a piece of cloth that can pass through solid matter, David Parr does a card trick by asking Alyson to copy all of his moves, and finally Penn and Teller honor the snobbish Magic Circle by having Teller guess a card without the use of his eyes.

6.title: Something Fishy This Way Comes
6.plot: Humorous shock magician Dan Sperry terrorizes Alyson with his macabre coin trick, Jean-Pierre Parent shrinks Alyson, Scotsman Naathan Phan does a balloon trick, Richard Forget makes a paper bird fly, and Penn is now a mentalist goldfish.

7.title: A Big Round of Applause for Alyson
7.plot: Ricardo Bordini enchants Alyson with his guitar, funnyman Yan Markson uses a mentalist app, Ondrej Psenicka has Alyson do a trick for him, sleight of hand veteran Glenn Morphew teleports cards, and P&T guess a computer password.

8.title: I Dream of Genie Tube
8.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this time: Dennis Watkins synchronizes two deck of cards using magic, real life magic school professor Jeff McBride asks the heavens to quench his thirst with an endless supply of water, millennial CEO Kevin Li does a narrative trick with pictures from his travels placed on magic cards which makes Teller feel melancholic, Steve Marshall does a masterful dice stacking trick that his late mentor taught him, and finally Penn and Teller present the magic of little audience member Constance who pulls a rabbit out of nowhere.

9.title: Penn & Teller Are Full of Hot Air
9.plot: Liberty Larsen traps Alyson's card in ice, Jorge Blass reenacts Prince and the Frog, "fooler" Paul Gertner returns with vanishing balls, funnyman Sergio Starman is haunted by heartache, and balloon versions of Penn and Teller do a trick.

10.title: Monkey Business
10.plot: Sean-Paul and his wife have a mind-reading monkey, Jason Andrews walks on broken glass to get to his act, Eric Mead wows with coins and games the game theory, edgy Reza guesses everyone's card, and the audience does P&T's patriotic trick.

11.title: Penn Does the Heavy Lifting
11.plot: Funnyman Stuart MacDonald and his magic mirror make some money, self-deprecating funnyman and cinefile Kyle Littleton plays movie cards with Alyson and the late supersized comedian Ralphie May, veteran turned street magician Lion Fludd does a card guessing game with Penn and Teller, husband and wife magic duo Fred and Bobbie Becker walk through metal, and Penn finally shows us where his weight went when he asks two audience members to lift a box for him.

12.title: Penn & Teller & Dracula
12.plot: Magicians looking to fool them this time: funnyman Mike Bliss has two young ladies tie him up, Dobrokhotova Ekaterina from Canada does a guessing trick with Alyson inspired by Banksy's graffiti of the Balloon Girl, Javi Benitez from Spain does incredible artsy card tricks, Ran Gafner does a trick with ringing bells with the help of Alyson and five random audience members, and finally Penn and Teller return to their childhood to play with Dracula's undead balls.

13.title: Hanging Out with Penn & Teller
13.plot: Magicians looking to fool Penn and Teller on the season finale: funnyman Patrik Kuffs uses a crossbow to do the most dangerous card guessing trick with Alyson, Todd Lamanske does an ace card trick with Alyson and the boys, Adam Wilber prints a $100 bill for a random audience member, Hector from Spain (aka "Hector Is Magic") plays with shadows and Alyson's wedding ring, and Penn and Teller's friends, magicians Jen and Amber, perform their own version of P&T's classic trick from Penn & Teller Get Killed (1989).

locations: Penn & Teller Theater, Rio All-Suite Hotel & Casino - 3700 W Flamingo Road, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA::(performance venue)
imdb.plot outline: A highly entertaining and thrilling one-hour competition series celebrating magic and featuring the legendary magician duo Penn and Teller. On each episode, aspiring magicians from all around the world are invited to perform their best trick to try and fool the two. To avoid spoiling the tricks, when Penn and Teller are able to guess how the contestants' magic works, they usually explain it in code, and when the contestants do manage to full them, they are rewarded with a guest spot on their famous magic show in Las Vegas. At the end of each episode, P&T also perform one of their own impressive tricks. British television and radio personality Jonathan Ross served as host until 2016, when Buffy the Vampire Slayer (1996) star Alyson Hannigan took over as the new charming host.
imdb.title: Penn & Teller: Fool Us
plot: Aspiring magicians from all over the world perform their best tricks to try and fool Penn and Teller, the world-famous magician duo. If the two can not guess how the trick was done, the "fooler" gets to be on their Las Vegas magic show.

A highly entertaining and thrilling one-hour competition series celebrating magic and featuring the legendary magician duo Penn and Teller. On each episode, aspiring magicians from all around the world are invited to perform their best trick to try and fool the two. To avoid spoiling the tricks, when Penn and Teller are able to guess how the contestants' magic works, they usually explain it in code, and when the contestants do manage to full them, they are rewarded with a guest spot on their famous magic show in Las Vegas. At the end of each episode, P&T also perform one of their own impressive tricks. British television and radio personality Jonathan Ross served as host until 2016, when _Buffy the Vampire Slayer (1996)_ (qv) star 'Alyson Hannigan' (qv) took over as the new charming host.::CW Publicity
